Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem near Irving Park. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem near Irving Park.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Roosevelt
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a signal problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are standing near Roosevelt due to a signal problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
